sense.name: Become extravagant or wasteful
sense.examples: He luxuriated with the purchase of a Mercedes-Benz CLK 320.

sense.name: Enjoy to excess
sense.commentary: Experiencer's emotional state is in reaction to a cause.
sense.examples: She luxuriated in the taste of the ice cream. He spent the morning luxuriating in bed. She luxuriated in the beauties of the natural world. He luxuriated in the warmth of the water. They luxuriated in their newly acquired wealth.

sense.name: Grow vigorously.
sense.examples: The herds luxuriated in the pastures. The plants luxuriated in the new soil.
